short_summary: Procurement for heavy equipment maintenance and repair service
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide contracted resources...
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**

**Title (English):** Equipment Fielding Detachment Services - Valcartier  
**Title (French):** Services pour le Détachement de Mise en Service de l’Équipement - Valcartier  

**Reference Number:** WS4125736773-Doc4126933038  
**Publication Date:** 30 November 2023

**Notice Information**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, in collaboration with the Department of National Defence, invites bids for the provision of contracted resources on an 'as and when requested basis' to support the Canadian Army’s Equipment Fielding Detachment at CFB Valcartier.

**Contract Details**

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Amendment Notice**

Amendment to Closing Time: Please disregard the previously posted closing times and submit all required supporting documentation and bids on 15 January 2024 by 14:00EDT (Eastern Daylight Time). Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Set-Aside for Indigenous Businesses**

This procurement has been set aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) and is open to Indigenous businesses only. To be eligible, bidders must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business and comply with all requirements of PSIB.

**Contract Requirements**

The successful bidder will provide contracted resources to support the Directorate of Land Command Systems Program Management (DLCSPM) at CFB Valcartier. This requirement is to support the deployment of equipment by the Canadian Army.

**Contact Information**

For further information or to obtain a copy of the tender documents, please contact:
Joshua Kaine (SPAC/PSPC)
[joshua.kaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joshua.kaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**

The full notice, including tender documents, can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18155988](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18155988) (Use Case Code: MTgxNTU5ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
